short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple add-on that calculates the price before tax and the amount of tax paid.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly calculate the price before tax and the amount of tax paid on a purchase. Helpful for accurately completing deductions and expenses when filing your income tax.
